name: Kat Morgan
text: Always have a great shopping experience. Same brands as everywhere else, but better service. I can't recommend them enough for your furniture and appliance needs. I'm also visually impaired, and they go the extra mile. It's all about the service for me - treat customers this good, and we'll shout recommendations from the mountain top. Take your money to honest retailers and shop at Family Home Furniture.

resp.text:
Ms. Morgan, I cannot thank you enough for your kind remarks. They mean so much to all of us here at Family Home Furniture. It was my pleasure helping you with your purchase.
Thanks so much!!!!

Brian

name: Kirkland Brown
text: Since we got our couch. We’ev been missing a piece. Yet we paid full price & they assured us it was going to be here in two months almost 3 months l8r. No other piece & still more excuses. Just go to a REAL furniture place. They can’t even call us & give us updates.

resp.text:
I am very sorry you are unhappy  Mr. Brown
Unfortunately I think you have the wrong furniture store as we do not have you in our system as having made a purchase with us.

However,  I would like to address your complaint about a furniture establishment.

Unfortunately for most businesses selling anything in America we are faced with challenges that are out of our control. For example,   there are shipping delays from overseas of products that are needed here for the assembly of furniture and chips for new cars.  Because of those delays dates change every day. When we do let our customers know a date, it can change the same afternoon which frustrates the customer even more.

Before the Pandemic, we could deliver on 90% of our goods within a 2-4 week time period. Now we cannot promise any date...the only thing we ask is that you hold on to your old furniture until your new furniture  arrives. We have even loaned out new furniture while a customer waits.
We have wholesale prices right now to help with that unfortunate waiting period. Some items come in next week after delivery, but some do not. It varies with every piece.

We value our customers, and if we could change what is going on in America we would . We go above and beyond for all of our customers. I just ask that you try and understand the circumstances that all retail establishments are having to deal with and navigate through. They are difficult, and we are all trying our best to get your items here as quickly as we can.
Factories in America are also understaffed, and those who are working are doing their very best as well. Transportation is trying to find more drivers, so that items can also be delivered in a timely fashion.
We have kept our prices  lower than anyone  to help better ease that frustration of timely delivery dates. So it is a great time to purchase from us, but patience will be needed in case dates change on an item.
Thank you so much for your understanding, and if you did purchase from us under a different name - I am sorry for the delays, and I too wished we had control over dates fluctuating.

name: Catherine Hatter
text: If you are looking for furniture, appliances, or televisions, please stop by this location. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful. They greet you with a smile and are willing to answer any questions you have. The prices are also amazing! This is an all around great place to purchase all of your home decor needs. Ask for Brian!

resp.text:
Thanks so much for the kind review!
Means so much when a customer takes the time to complement us!
Much appreciated!!

name: Tracy Lee
text: Great friendly atmosphere.  Willing to match prices from anywhere else.

resp.text: Thank you so very much Tracy for the kind review!!

name: Chontanee Combs
text: Best experience I’ve ever had with a furniture company! They met all my needs, and some!! Great place to shop and great people to do business with!

resp.text: Thank you so much for using us for all of your furniture needs! Most of all I greatly appreciate you taking time to share such kind words about our business. Thanks so much!

name: AJ
text: Still haven’t received my furniture and it’s been months. I understand the pandemic has slowed things down but it’s ridiculous. These people don’t even update you on the shipment, you’ll have to keep asking them yourself. Not a good look. If I paid in full for something you should be updating me frequently not the other way around. Won’t be shopping here again.

resp.text:
I am sorry that you feel we have not kept you informed more frequently about shipment dates.
I know we have spoke on several occasions, and emailed each other.
Every retail establishment in the country is having issues with receiving product in a timely manner. It is totally out of our control, and if we could change things we would.
Delivery ETA's change daily and weekly, and that is why we cannot truly set or promise delivery dates.
When we have spoken, I told you what it stated at that present time.
When we spoke later, and that date was different and longer it frustrated you more.
What you used to take 4-6 weeks has been now doubled. Sometimes it comes quicker which is a blessing. We take pride in Customer Service, and it is certainly not my intention to not properly inform you of shipment dates. We did provide you with a loaner while you wait which I do not believe any one else is doing.
My sincere apology if you felt like we have not provided you with the best service possible.

name: margie noe
text: Friendly staff and great prices!

resp.text:
Thanks so much for your kind review!
Much appreciated!

name: Jason Whittingham
text: Good experience!

name: Xtina lawry
text: Amazing people they treat you like family. love my furniture, love this place

resp.text:
Thank you so much!
We truly value our customers, and we are privileged to have you as a customer!

name: cwf fraley
text: Friendly staff & large selection of furnishings

resp.text: Thanks so much!!

name: Tonya Clark-Palmer
text: I have been dealing with the owner and his staff for years and personally I would not go anywhere else. The staff is polite and friendly.

resp.text: Thanks so much!

name: lozo311
text: Would've rated a zero if possible. Ordered a phone screen 2 months ago and received no calls saying it came in last week. Moving and they wouldn't refund the money. They did offer to sell me the screen for $15 under total costs of the screen and install.  They also Claimed they called me and I had no voicemail. Lol. Avoid at all costs. Horrible service.

resp.text: We apologize for any miscommunication that took place. It's our goal to make sure we're giving our customers a great experience, and it's unfortunate that you didn't receive our call. I appreciate you sharing your feedback, and we look forward to continuing to providing our customers with the top-notch service they deserve. -Robert Fales, Owner

name: Michelle Ervin
text: Very Nice And Friendly Staff!!

resp.text: Thanks so much Michelle!

name: Diana Garbutt
text: Very friendly and professional also store has great selection of anything you need !!!!Love the staff.

name: Donida Rigsby
text:

BTW ALL

resp.text: Thank you for rating and visiting our page.

name: Markeya Evans
text: One of the employees actually lied to me about a product, so he wouldn't have to get up and do his job. I knew he was lying but didn't want to start any confusion.

name: Christina Brewer
text: Very professional service and respectful to everyone.

resp.text: That's what we're all about here, Christina. It was a pleasure helping you out with everything, and we'll be here if you ever need anything else. Take care! -Robert Fales, Owner

name: Latisha Brown
text: I stood for a while was never asked if I needed help came out would never go back

name: Britany Cook
text: Friendly staff

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review!

name: Kenny Hollinhead
text: Good people

resp.text: Thanks so much!

name: Curtis Campbell
text: Friendly staff

resp.text: Thanks so much Curtis!

name: Tina Roehm
text: Great people

resp.text: Thank you for rating and visiting our page.

name: Debbie White
text: A great place to buy affordable home decor, lamps & furniture. Owner & her staff are all extremely helpful in finding the pieces you are looking for. Highly recommend!

name: Frank Kertis
text: Mz Emily was extremely helpful

name: Jason Hatter
text: Great furniture, accessories and people.

name: Troy Boy
text: We decorated out office at our plant with their wares.  Nice southern styles.

name: Angelique Edwards
text: Love this store. Very beautiful furniture and pretty good fair price.

name: Arrice Faught
text: Love this store!  Great furniture!

name: Mandy Thomas

name: Terry Brownlee

name: Crystal Anderson
text: Really unique furniture! It may not look like much from the outside but they have a great selection of farmhouse items. Glad we stopped in here! We will be back!

name: Patrick Snell

resp.text: Thank you Patrick for your review! We try to have a good variety of quality furniture for our customers.

name: Lysol Weeks
text: 3 BIG buildings packed full of some really good looking rustic furniture and home stuff. Special wholesale pricing.. i always get what i need here at an awesome price. A must see..

resp.text: Thank you for coming by, we enjoy having you and your family in our store!

name: Joanna Jones
text: I would give it 5 stars but it was still closed from the fire they had in March so I couldn't shop. There was lots of stuff I would like to purchase if they reopen. It would be nice if owner would post that they were closed from fire as we came from Florida.

name: Justin Rodgers
text:
Despite having good stuff; my mother, brother and I were chased out by one of the managers with a really foul attitude.  (full story and quotes on facebook)

My mother got us excited to drive TWO HOURS to see this place but when we got there, one of the managers singled me and my brother out separately asking "Are you going to buy anything?" as well as some other angry, uncalled for aggression.  When we said "No sir" he told us "you need to leave, right now!"  We were escorting our mother because it's in a bad part of town!  When my mother came to inquire about something she wanted to purchase this man told her he was with someone (another employee) and couldn't "deal with her" and she would just have to wait.  He was very rude and angry with her too.

We drove two hours so my mother could spend a LOT OF MONEY on things there but we were chased out within 5 minutes!!   We were treated like bums begging for money!  We would not have driven halfway across the state to kick your tires!  The things you said to my family will NOT FLY with me!  Uncalled for and unprofessional!

There are lots of antique stores closer to our small town, all which treat us like customers not garbage.  We try to buy at least 2 or 3 things whenever we visit.  We will not be coming back here though.

name: Christine Cole
text: Vintage Station is my new favorite place to find unique, salvaged, re-purposed home decor. It's also overflowing with unique, one-of-a-kind antiques & beautiful custom order furniture. If you can dream it, they can build it! And if you want to build it yourself they have barnwood, salvaged windows & doors, & plenty of odds & ends to help you create your own masterpiece!

name: Brian Svencer
text: We were very excited about visiting after seeing all the advertising and neat pictures posted. When arriving the owner approached us and apologized for it being disorderly. Another nice gentleman approached us and informed us of all the areas available to be seen. While speaking to both men we informed him of the interest we had in the reclaimed lumber and that we custom make them ourselves back home. He gave us pricing on what he had and told us to check out the shop area and to let him know if we needed help with any lumber. We also refinish furniture for a living and are on the look out for good fixer uppers to refinish and resell. So we walked around the top and bottom floor. They had nothing of good quality to choose from. We then made our way out to the "OPEN TO THE PUBLIC COME ON IN" shop area. The craftsmanship done by his employees was great and we were simply admiring the work done. NO PHONE, NO CAMERA simply looking and out of no where the owner comes up to my husband and tells him "IF YOU ARENT HERE TO BUY YOU NEED TO LEAVE" "WE BUILD CUSTOM TABLES FOR CLIENTS" "WE ARE A CHRISTIAN BASED COMPANY AND WE DONT NEED ANYONE STEALING OUR DESIGNS" Now if I was taking pictures of this mans work I could understand his hostility but we weren't we were simply browsing his shop, custom tables, painted furniture and doors as we were told to do. Then he approaches me and tells me if I'm not here to buy anything from him to leave right now and never come back. He turns back around to my husband who was holding our 1 year old in his arms and leans in like he is about to grab him and yells to my husband to walk faster and to get out. While this place looks great in pictures it is not what they display online. How this man stays in business talking to customers the way he does is unreal to me. Christian business?!? You are a hotheaded joke. I have browsed the other reviews and this is not the first time or the last that this man has ran out good paying customers.

name: Campbell Dunbar
text: Their work is beautiful, but when we have spent hours going through hundreds of doors during an Alabama summer heat wave to find a few matching pairs and the owner couldn't even spend 3 minutes with us discussing what might be a fair price for all of it I knew we wouldn't be back. We were told to let them know when we were ready and the owner would come out and talk to us about prices. When he did he was very rude, inconsiderate, and his pricing system made no sense. He wanted $75 per door on every door we had, even though some were in much worse shape than others. We came prepared to spend a pretty penny and ended up spending a fraction of that because of his attitude. We won't be back. The drive out there is not worth the hassle and we do not recommend that anyone else waste their time either.

name: Diane Cann Pigott
text: I was out there on Sunday and they were closed, but from what I could see it was amazing

name: Billy
text: Great place to fine old stuff.

name: susan evans
text: Rude rude rude. Didn’t say thank you for your business or come back to see us…:(… very disappointed!!!

name: Pamela Sanders
text: Like to visit and get ideas

name: Joseph Johnson
text: The store is well-kept and apt for the hoity toity for sure but, only those that wish to decorate for neutral, bland palettes. Perfect for the suburban Xerox copy family looking to "blend-in" not for an urban stylistic leaning preference.

name: Gecki
text: Urban Home Market is a wonderful resource for great selection of quality furniture and accessories at reasonable prices.  After shopping for dining tables all over Birmingham, we finally bought one at Urban Home and are very happy with it.  Shannon was knowledgeable and helpful, and the delivery guys were also great.  Thank you, Urban Home!

name: Melanie O'Keefe
text: I went in to buy some chairs. I asked the price of a chair and purchased 2. They delivered the wrong chairs. Luckily I had taken a picture of the chair. After a long back and forth the sales person had sold me the wrong chairs. They said they would honor the price and order me the chairs as they didn’t have any in the warehouse. They said it would be 8 weeks. I called 7 weeks later to check on the status. Apparently they never placed the order. Its beyond belief how much they screwed up. They lost a good customer forever!

name: Erin
text: During the pandemic it was difficult to shop for furniture. Urban Home was incredibly helpful and professional. They had a beautiful selection and went out of their way to make it easier for us during such a trying time to move.

name: Dianne Scott
text: Excellent service, good selection of furniture and good prices.

name: Michael Garrett
text: Neat place. A lot of stylish home goods. My wife enjoys the store very much. A friendly, helpful staff. Prices seem a bit high to me, just an opinion.

name: jim lawrence
text: Employee westley is a theif

name: Vicki Everett
text:
As you enter the door of Urban Home, a warm welcome is awaiting you with talented designers ready to create a new home environment for your
needs! We are the receipent of a lovely new room in our home designed by Urban Home and spend many peaceful hours enjoying it! Stop by today and enjoy their Thanksgiving and holiday decorating ideas and head home with new ideas and new decorating items to add more warmth and love to your home !

name: Tommy Barrows
text: Such a large selection. Beautiful pieces. Wonderful staff. Don't miss the close out room in the back right corner for deep discount deals. Ask for Drew, he's one of the buyers and decorators, fabulous!

name: Caroline Lowe
text: Urban Home is the epitome of southern elegance. The staff is incredibly helpful and welcoming. Each visit is a new experience and like coming into your own home. I would recommend Urban Home Market to anyone who wants to bring Southern Class into their home.

name: Lorie Myrick
text:
I love this store! Emily has helped us design our home! We could not be more pleased with the furniture selection, the service, and the kindness and knowledge of all the employees .
It is a place worth your time to visit!

name: Deby Tooker
text: Nice living room offerings but I was disappointed by the lack of bedroom furniture. The staff was friendly and the store was clean. This is a good place to shop for living room furniture and accessories.

name: Josh Hall
text:
The Urban team are very professional, knowledge, courteous and a hell of alot of fun!!!
Emily has an incredible taste level and we are very excited how she is putting our new home together!

name: Amy Baker
text: This place, located at Lee Branch by Hobby Lobby, has consistently impressive interior design pieces such as tables, chairs, mirrors, lamps, chandeliers, etc. —-some styles rustic and some more contemporary —Also, this store has ever-changing home decor knick knacks such as pillows, wall hangings, tableware, etc. Has appropriately helpful associates who are not pushy.

name: Allan Scott
text: Not one person who was working in the store even spoke. I've read this about the store before I experienced it myself. Beautiful furniture and artwork. I'll be buying my furniture where I live in Buckhead, GA. Missed opportunity for this store.

name: Wanda Campbell
text: Very beautiful furniture and accessories. Great people that know their business. LOVE this store!!!

name: dawn reeves
text: From chandeliers to armoires, amazing furniture and more, Urban Home has absolutely everything to furnish your home.  And, the service... Second to none!

name: Remy Helu
text: Great product good helpful people give them a visit.

name: Ashley Truc Do
text: I'm highly recommend this place to anyone who's shopping new furnitures for your homes....such a well trained, professional staffs and great choices of furnitures to choose from.

name: Gwen Dennis

name: k arrington

Woodwork is solid and some of the best prices that I've seen in the nation. I wish I could order one of those gliders to be shipped to me in Texas, way better than trying to pay huge furniture prices here. #everythingisbiggerinTexas

name: Mary Adamy
text: Very disappointed in OLD pine straw delivered from Sweatmon’s.  When I called and asked for fresh bales as a replacement, they said no.  They would  not consider refunding money for this bad product.  Needless to say, we will no longer purchase ANYTHING from them with such poor customer service.

name: Kim Smith
text: The best selection of plants, high quality merchandise, knowledgeable and always friendly staff, fresh produce. It's my go-to place for so many reasons!

name: Johnny Franklin
text: Rustic furniture, plants and gardening supplies, Smith Lake souvenirs and produce sold here by nice people

name: Betty Auston
text: They have a very nice amount to choose from.

name: Sam Holloway
text: DO NOT PURCHASE PINE STRAW FROM SWEATMON’S!! We have given them a lot of business over the last several years. This year they delivered OLD pine straw. When we called and asked them for a refund and to exchange with new, they refused. We will take our business elsewhere in the future.

name: Hans Corser
text: Good place to go for fresh veggies and flowers.

name: Stephen Shaw
text: Great veggies, plants and things for your yard and house...

name: Joe Devine

name: Jeremy Pate

name: Sherri Lee

name: dana Beckmann
text: Love this place and the owners are great people.. We've bought outside furniture to flowers and produce never have we had any problems with anything. We always go back and will continue to do so.. Thank y'all so much for everything

name: Patricia Ray
text: Great family! We've bought several pieces of furniture and have been VERY pleased. Love the produce and flowers for every season😊. Everything from pinestraw to pepper jelly. It's really a one stop shop.... don't miss out!

text: We're so glad that they are open! A GREAT place for produce and your flowers and gardening needs! They are great folks! I give them all the stars!

name: Debby Downing
text: I thought this would be a good alternative to my usual grocery store produce trip, but each and every vegetable and fruit that I have bought here has been bruised, discolored, & tasteless...Not very far from rotten it seems.

name: Lisa D
text: Love this place.

name: Talitha Barros
text: The Rustic Barn in Dothan, Alabama is awesome!! We purchased our king-size bed  with end tables, dining table and desk there.  They have such a great service they stored it until we were ready for delivery.  The men that delivered and set it up were so professional and kind.  We are looking forward to shopping there for more items in the near future!

name: Chuck Wray
text: First trip to the Rustic Barn.  I like the mix of items and the quality of materials.  Prices are good for what you get.  We will be back to get more items for the new house.

name: Sarah Elizabeth
text: Gorgeous wood furniture, wonderful customer service and very clean store! If you see something you like though, get it or it may be gone fast! I speak from experience on that.   They are accommodating in placing orders for you if need be.   Super fantastic people!

name: Shirley Baxley
text: Love the options and designs.  Bedroom sets, dining room tables and chairs, living room tables, and kitchen islands, they offer wonderful choices.

name: Nancy Anderson
text: Love this store! Beautiful furniture!!

name: Kteetel
text: This place is pretty amazing. We loved a lot of their furniture and they are super nice. Same people working and always great service if you need. We bought our bedroom set from there. Hands down better than any furniture we have been to in Dothan/ Malvern area.

name: Jimmy Casey

If you like the rustic look furniture, this is your heaven.
Great selection, fair honest pricing.
Quality is outstanding.

name: Terri Stinson

name: Diane Irby

name: Gina Baxley
text: Absolutely gorgeous furniture!! The craftsmanship is amazing! The service is the friendliest I have encountered in this area! I highly recommend!!

name: Z. Katlane
text: I Love this place! Unique furniture and decor, friendly service. They are right there to answer all your questions, yet stay out of your way to let you look around. They add new and seasonal decor items all the time, so you have to keep going back. I have purchased furniture here. Love it.

name: Rebecca Knight
text: Really good quality wood furniture. I especially like the benches that go with the dining tables. There are different stains. They have cupboard s, cabinets, and islands for the kitchen, bedroom furniture, and more.

name: Melissa Fischer
text: Beautiful furniture! Well built and solid.

name: Rene Parker
text: Beautiful quality furniture, reasonable prices, very nice and helpful people!

name: Stanley Morehead
text: Great furniture, great people. Very unique product.

name: Anne Mary Nichols
text: So many amazing pieces of furniture!  We will definitely be furnishing our new house with their stuff!

name: Chris Christensen
text: Great quality at a fair price.  Staff and owners are wonderful people.

name: Doris Adkins
text: Love the stuff

name: Furqan Aziz
text: They sells vintage cars and rustic furniture.  Friendly people. If you visit,  and find that the entrance on the highway is closed, then wait at the door. There is a camera and somebody usually shows up. Beware there is a dog on the premises.

name: Harold Street
text: Lots of beautiful things. Very helpful staff. Will be back

name: Suzanne Davis
text: Always a great experience. Very helpful and great merchandise

name: Dave Chavers
text: Great products! Friendly service.

name: Wayne Phillips
text: Very nice folks.

name: Ronnie Reed
text: They took $486 restocking fee and never ordered the furniture. I had to call them after a month. Then I cancel my order.

name: D.l. Overstreet
text: My first visit was a 2 hour fantasy land of great furniture.  I bought a bar for my cabin and picked it up a few days later. Well packed for travel  and was even better looking when unboxed. It matched other pieces i have better than planned.   Every item is individual and exceptional.  I could not be more pleased!  The Reeders were so helpful in my choices and you really got that customer service.  Oh yes!  I will be back there again and so will my friends.

name: Marty Warren
text: I actually went there to unlock a vehicle...I'm a local locksmith...I did find some fabulous jewelry here...yes, at a furniture store. I was amazed at the outstanding selection of furniture..I will be back. The owners were just very welcoming !!! Thanx so much!!!                Marty warren, Warren's locksmith , ozark al. Local AAA rep.

name: Kathy Byler
text: Absolutely love this store!

name: Diana Bixby
text: My goodness, felt like I had uncovered a treasure!

name: Charles Benson
text: Beautiful furniture. Friendly staff.

name: Andy Bowman
text: Good looking furniture and a great selection.

name: Cathy Solis
text: Beautiful hand crafted furniture and accessories! Love the building as well as the atmosphere!

name: Janet Hatcher
text: Very nice and quality furniture. Folks are very friendly and helpful!

name: Jeffery Bell
text: Very friendly and helpful people with quality built furniture with reasonable prices!

name: Beverly White
text: Love this place and such sweet people that own and operate it!!! So much to look it!!!

name: Tara Marino
text: Great quality furniture, super nice staff and reasonable prices for pieces that will last a lifetime!

name: Bess Day
text: Love this store! Prices are very reasonable!

name: Robert Dillard
text: Nice furniture.. medium price

name: Leann Chancellor
text: Love this place

name: Hunter Scott
text: Don't do it

resp.text: Sorry you feel the need to give a one star rating you obviously are not a customer and have not expressed any concerns directly with us.  The mass matters and they have enjoyed their visit.

name: maura robertson
text: Amazing experience!

name: Sherian Tucker
text: Wonderful

name: Tim Bigham
text: Very nice products, and very friendly

name: EVERYTHING CHILDERS
text:
On Tuesday, my last shopping Pier 1 businesses ended in Jones Valley.
Gave both locations great support.  However...the Jones Valley stop CSR's had been polite & answered questions...but wouldn't help gather my large quantity of items. I had to gather, lift, & carry them.
Following Spine & Hip injections, this was strain to my back & painful. Afterwards, I struggled walking. The associate permitted me to use their plastic cart. After leaving, I was complaining to myself, as I crossed the street to my car. A lady, carrying Bath & Body bag, crossed as well. I commented about the associates at the store being lazy.
As that person went on. I loaded my things & was leaving the cart on the grass.  The lady in the parking area yelled & demanded I return the cart. I didn't fully understand. So, I asked again what she said. She made her demand on me about 3 times.
I asked her if she worked there? She said yes.  I asked if she was a Manager? She said Yes!
I tried to tell her about the laziness I was dealing with.
She became irritated with me. No peaceful problem solving was enacted.
She came hurriedly at me. I asked her to stop. I warned her, she was crossing the line.  She came anyways, within inches of me, calling me lazy, grabbed my cart without my permission, & proceeded to the store, being loud, calling me lazy repeatedly, & told me to never step foot in her store again!
She definitely broke the Covid rules, & came to close to me besides, causes me to feel uncomfortable.
I requested the 911 service & filed a report.
The Manager, should have been more professional.  She ordered me to never come back & she don't have to worry.  I don't want to!!!
All I can say is remember when shopping at the Jones Valley location, to take help for you, because they are not much help.  And watch out for the Quick Tempered Manager.
It's 4 AM & my Spine & hip still hurt.  This  is a shame!
🥺😢

name: Joshua Trotter
text: Was not able to purchase my items. Store did not have sufficient change for my transaction so I was told to come back at a later date. So what your telling me is that it is two weeks before Christmas, the store has been open for several hours and you don't have change for a hundred dollar bill? Why would you even open up for business without change to operate with? How many other paying customers were unable to make a cash purchase?  Staff was rude and the store manager would not even come out of the back room to talk with me? Good luck Pier 1...

name: Pixie Lent
text: I love the home items but it's a little pricey.

name: Sheri Spuhl
text: We like this store. When they have a sale, it's fun to add a colorful "something".  The staff is welcoming.

name: Paula Lindon
text: My happy place! Love it!

name: Tim Harrison
text: So-so store. You can get some great deals on sale items. Full price is usually kind of expensive.

name: Christina Morgan
text:
It's everything you expect forom pier one regarding selection and quality products. No better place for fun and tasteful holiday decor.

This particular location has really stood out in terms of helpful staff. Several times I have gone in not sure of exactly whathat I wanted, and the staff had gone above and beyond helping me find just the right thing. I'm not very creative and they have helped my 'create' pieces, step by step. When looking for decor, I head to them first due to the phenomenal staff!!

name: Lester Pettigrew
text: The coolest home decor ever.  Great quality, and the management and staff are unbelievably nice, helpful, friendly, and knowledgeable!  You can tell they love what they do!  5 stars!

name: Larry Trotter
text: Left without purchasing anything! Very Rude employees and Manager did not care less! We went around the corner to Kirkland's and purchased what we needed. Pier 1 will not be around much longer with this kind of service and a manager ( Mrs. Pearl) with this kind of attitude.

name: B Gram
text: Stuck up and snobby staff if you don't look or dress a certain way. What a shame I'm getting a new house and have to buy all new things that I CAN afford. Oh well

name: Jamie Martin
text: Fun place to shop. Cool things for the home.

name: Brenda Estes
text: Its was great. Love to shop there.

name: Tammy Willard
text: This time they didn't have I was looking for!

name: Cathy Clayton
text: Service at this store is pathetic. I will NEVER go back.

name: Kelli T
text: Great customer service!

name: Jenny Michell
text: Great ideas for the fall season.

name: Sharon D
text: Love everything about this store!

name: McH
text: Poor signage for pickups.

name: McH
text: Poor signage for pickups.

name: Sabrina Presto
text: Good inventory

name: Kenneth Goodman
text: Prices are absurd

name: Kim Bell Schneider
text: I bought some candles for my den.

name: Asher Berry
text: sort of uninspiring

name: Matt G Alabama
text: Look this place!!!

name: Nancy Stein
text: Love!

name: Jeanice Bengen
text: Took advantage of their clearance sale by getting 4 place mats and a wicker, center mat for $10!! Looks perfect for a simple, country dining table. I love it!

name: tammy myrick
text: I usually shop at the Pier 1 in Mobile so this was my 1st time there. The store was really neat and the staff are very friendly and helpful!

name: Laurie Watson McKay
text: Got a wedding gift here. Lots of options. Good service and great suggestions from this team.

name: KG Gregory
text: Great selection of out of the ordinary!

Always having what I need with great deals and many sales going on, with candles 2 for $20 couldnt ask for a better deal this season I'm never disappointed when going to pier 1 there my to go store and always finding exactly what I need for any occasion!!

name: Yancey Burnett
text: Apparently one must be Buddhist to visit. . .i was unaware of this requirement

name: Alisha Rogers
text: Love the decor they sell here.

name: Kim Tracey ella
text: Really like pier one good selection seasonal sales and stuff is great

name: S.T.
text: Pier 1 is the best!!

name: Susan Fonger
text: Terrific staff

name: terry bassett
text: Nice variety, great sales

name: Joanne Wilson
text: I love this store.

name: Tommy Robinson
text: Great stuff but prices are high

name: Karen Taylor
text: Lovely place with nice items and reasonable prices. The staff was friendly and helpful. They also offer painting classes.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Delores Burgess
text: Beautiful furniture and pieces for all occasion. Chalk pain selection good, Wonderful owner and very helpful in instructions on your own projects. Need to check this place out for ideas and gifts for the hollidays.

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Robert Smith
text: Beautiful pieces, reasonable prices.

name: Ed Browning
text: Awesome products!

name: Kayla Smith
text: The owners are amazing people! They care about their customers and go above and beyond! They have so many beautiful furniture pieces; that they put their own touch to, home decor, clothes, etc. Great pricing on everything, as well . Don't pass by this place without stopping by, you won't regret it!

name: Amy Weiss
text: Wow!!  All I can say is what an incredible furniture store!  I will be back when I have a half-day to explore because there is so much to look at!  Beautiful, unique pieces that are affordable.  Don't miss this fabulous shop!

name: Tanisha Foster
text: If you're looking for something different and kind of unique, this is your store. Ive been coming here for years and I find something that I want every time I come.

name: Joy Tierce
text: Wished I had visited this store before I purchased my living room furniture.  Some very nice furniture at reasonable prices.

name: jason kirby
text: It was good. No hassle. The furniture is kinda of over priced seeing what some of its made of. Looks like wood but it's paneling board. I bought one of the tables. Looks ok till you flip table over

name: Laura Grayson
text: Love their furniture. They have a great staff that is always helpful and polite. I can say you can get lost in here framing up ideas of were to put things. They also have consignment side. So there are a ton of little hidden treasures to find on this store. Need rugs they have those to. Also love there artwork and pictures.

name: Erica Smith
text: I love this place! They have tons of furniture options at great prices. And it's not stuff you see in everyone's home. I love the unique pieces they get. The staff is so easy to work with, definitely my go to place when I want furniture, lamps or lighting.

name: Braxton Connell
text: Very helpful staff and very neat furniture, vintage and barely used.

name: Della Moore
text: Have bought before. Bought a rug today. Great mdse to browse and buy.....wonderful people😊

name: Annie Reiner
text: This place is amazing!! The people there are super nice and I got the exact dresser new for only $140.00. HIGHLY recommend

name: Rose Buffer
text: #Knowledgable #Courteous #Considerate #QualityPieces #Great$$ #BestOptionsInTownForOurNeeds  The last stop on the Sideboard Hunt. "E" used our Want List to help us search their multiple options. We FOUND it!  #AnOffTheBeatenPathStore  #WELLworthTheVisit  We will shop here again!

name: Bobby Hustead
text: excellent farmhouse collection

name: Jay Barrow
text: I sent them two items and they sold both in a timely manner at a far better price than I could have gotten.  Thanks so much!  The customer service was outstanding.  I am very pleased.

name: Connie Grechanik
text: Lotof merchandise

name: Charles Henry Hall.
text: Expensive furniture cheap furniture there is some furniture that I saw that was so cheap I was surprised how cheap it was.

name: AMC
text: The owners and staff are extremely friendly and helpful, even when they have several customers they're waiting on at once. They have some unique items and this is the kind of place I could 'browse' for quite a while. Not all of their items are used; they've changed over the years and it seems like the majority of what I saw the last several times I visited were new. Their prices are still very reasonable and fair, but keep that in mind if you're expecting to find thrift store or even scratch and dent merchandise.

name: Katie Cole
text: We love the attic! The lady running the store was so helpful & knowledgable about the furniture. We found the perfect couch and will def be back to get more furniture from them! We shopped all around town and their quality, service and selection was THE BEST! They also helped my husband when he asked for something to cover the couch in transport. They are GREAT!

name: kathryn wilkerson
text: I love to furniture shop here! Excellent selection at all price points and all styles. Really kind staff also.

name: Billy Phillips
text: Great stuff just you'll just pay a ton for it.

name: Samantha Giambalvo
text: The owners are super friendly, but let me be honest… Even if they weren't super friendly I would come in there for the furniture and home accessories they have… Beautiful amazing stuff!

name: Harn Bennet
text: While there is a nice selection of furniture on hand, I found it all to be extremely over priced for the level of quality offered.  There was a consignment area, but again for used pieces of furniture they are priced as high retail.

name: Nika LLC
text: Racist and very rude!!! I visited this store just to look around after reading about it online. I was never greeted, I was followed around the store( still never greeted) and was told I could not afford the furniture I was looking at. Absolutely DISGUSTED! Do not patronize this place they call a business.

name: Princess
text: This place always had a stocked consignment section full of great finds and excellent prices.

name: Ray Burkhalter
text: Wow, this place is a hidden treasure. Lots of interesting furniture, glad my wife wanted to go inside.

name: JJ Jones (JJ)
text: Huge selection of new and gently used, unique items. The day I made a purchase, they were having difficulty with their credit card machine. It was not until several days later that I noticed I had been charged for the item twice. I went back and they were super helpful and took care of the situation immediately. While there, I confirmed the details of my purchase. However, the day I returned to pick up my item, I was told the new, boxed item had been accidentally given away to another customer and I was going to have to take the used floor model or a refund. Disappointing experience for my first purchase from this store.

name: John Sparks
text: Only 2 bad reviews and both just happen to be named haniff, hmmmm.  This place is awesome.  Don't let one idiot with an agenda turn you off to this great place to shop for furniture.   I've bought many times from the Attic and I've never had one problem and been very happy with my purchase.  A+++++

name: Jason Polancich
text: I recently bought 5K+ worth of stuff here. I'm giving this place 1 star due to a very, very bad recent experience with one of their delivery folks. To be honest, compared to other local furniture stores, this place is refreshingly well-stocked with tasteful furniture and nice consignment pieces. The floor people are nice and helpful and even the owner is a reasonable man, but I very nearly got into a physical altercation with a very maladjusted delivery driver who (I can only guess) disliked the look of me from the second he arrived. Despite a long professional career starting and selling tech companies, I'm from Alabama and have just moved "home." That said, I look like a run of the mill "redneck" and dress that way as well (by desire). When he drove up, he was immediately put into a foul mood by the sight of me. He asked me where to put the items he was pulling from the truck and I pointed and told him "in the living room right here" behind my front home wall. He proceeded to leave ALL the items on my porch and drove away. It was a king-size bed, long sofa, two chairs and a very tall cabinet of drawers. I called the store to tell them what happened, they returned the delivery men and he called me a liar, saying I told him to drop them on the porch. He then proceeded to tell me I was a bad person and that he "knows people like me" while gesturing angrily. I called the store back while he got the store owner on the phone. I spoke to the owner on the phone while he ranted angrily. Needless to say my blood began boiling as well as I explained what was happening outside my door during the call with the owner. The owner initially bristled, taking the side of the delivery guys but did listen to my account and my offer to show him the video of the event from my front porch Nest camera. In the end, he agreed to refund the delivery charge and seems like a decent man, but he's definitely got a liability on his hands there in the delivery man. Beware.

name: Rena' Wright
text: I love this store

name: hanifimanifi (hanifimanifi)
text: Think twice or three times when you are buying something . I am not sating don't buy anything else from here. They have good stuff and services.but you can bring trouble to your home.Check the furnitures and mattresses,they could have fleas in it. They sell it As is.

name: Jeff Jones
text: Awesome furniture and owners are great people.

name: Jason Stowe
text: Not bad prices.

name: Hannah Malone
text: Very rustic furniture with good prices!

name: Harry Knight
text: Good place to shop

name: Orrie Kemp
text: My favorite store.

name: Lori Clark
text: Primitive furniture finds

text: Touch of everything

name: LaTasha Thomas
text: Worst place to have a auto accident in the morning and downtown

name: Charles Edwards
text: Come here often
